original_text: Do not make an altar which has stairs going up to it. If you do that, someone may see under your clothes when you climb up the stairs. Then you would be ashamed.”
korean_text: 너는 층계로 내 제단에 오르지 말라 네 하체가 그 위에서 드러날까 함이니라

sentences.original_text: which has stairs going up to it
someone may see under your clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 누군가 네 옷 아래를 볼 수 있다

sentences.original_text: when you climb up the stairs

sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 네가 수치를 당하게 될 것이다
